changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE [Categoria] ( [Id] int NOT NULL IDENTITY, [Nombre] nvarchar(255) NOT NULL, [Orden] int NOT NULL, [CategoriaId] int NULL, [EstadoRegistro] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [FechaCreacion] datetime2 NOT NULL, [FechaModificacion] datetime2 NOT NULL, [FechaEliminacion] datetime2 NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Categoria] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]), CONSTRAINT [FK_Categoria_Categoria_CategoriaId] FOREIGN KEY ([CategoriaId]) REFERENCES [Categoria] ([Id]) ON DELETE NO ACTION ); GO CREATE INDEX [IX_Categoria_CategoriaId] ON [Categoria] ([CategoriaId]); GO
